widget.description: The app covers the dynamic aspects of social profile,pet profile,promote your business by creating your business profile,pet adoption with a twist where you can search for pets and people looking for pets, pet mating and dating, lost and found service, ambulance data and cemetery details just so you spend more time cuddling your pet rather than scouring this information from different sources. So hop on to the bandwagon and show your love out loud to the pet fam and enjoy great companionship for life.
